meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slavish or servile.
meanings.sent1: Her slavishnesses towards her boss were evident in how she never questioned his orders.
meanings.sent2: The slavishnesses of the loyal servant knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: The slavishnesses of the puppy towards its owner was both adorable and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The slavishnesses of the followers to the cult leader was like a chain binding their minds.
meanings.sent5: The slavishnesses of the robot to its programming made it seem almost human in its obedience.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of someone who is overly submissive or obedient.
meanings.sent1: His slavishnesses in always agreeing with others made him seem insincere.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the slavishnesses of her classmates who never spoke up for themselves.
meanings.sent3: The slavishnesses of the cat towards its favorite toy was both cute and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The slavishnesses of the employees to their demanding boss was like a silent surrender.
meanings.sent5: The slavishnesses of the student to the strict teacher was like a shadow following them everywhere.
